attributes.action: Encourage BA to bring Concorde out of retirement to become a heritage aircraft.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Concorde, possible the greatest aircraft ever to grace the skies, has been in retirement since 2003. It is disappointing and sad to see that one of Britain’s greatest technical achievements is no longer flying. We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to encourage British Airways to bring Concorde out of retirement for it to become a heritage aircraft. We propose that Concorde could lead the Red Arrows flypast at the 2012 Olympics.
